node.statement: Step 1.3.4 (Spectral deformation): While the BPS count is q-independent, the non-BPS spectrum of H_q depends on q. The energy eigenvalues satisfy E_q(R, l) = (J/3){[2j+1]_q - 3([N_psi]_q + [j+1/2]_q) + 3 sum_m <O^dagger_{j,m}(q) O_{j,m}(q)>}, providing a smooth q-deformation of the BLM spectrum that reduces to the standard spectrum at q=1.
